Velm ‚Äã

Modular. Composable. Predictable. ‚Äã

Velm is a model composition framework for Laravel that allows multiple modules to safely extend and participate in the same Eloquent model ‚Äî without inheritance, traits, or runtime magic.

It introduces a compile-time model pipeline that gives you the power of modularity while preserving Laravel‚Äôs familiar developer experience.

Why Velm? ‚Äã

Laravel makes it easy to build applications ‚Äî
Velm makes it possible to scale them without architectural debt.

When applications grow, models tend to become:

  • tightly coupled
  • hard to reason about
  • dangerous to extend across modules

Velm solves this by introducing intentional composition at the model layer.

Core Ideas ‚Äã

üß± Model Buckets ‚Äã

A Model Bucket represents a logical model (e.g. Product) and collects all participating definitions across modules.

Each module contributes its own definition ‚Äî without overriding or conflicting with others.

üîó Method Pipelines ‚Äã

Model methods are compiled into ordered pipelines.

Each module can:

  • run logic before or after others
  • call super() to continue the chain
  • override behavior intentionally

No traits. No inheritance. No ambiguity.

‚öôÔ∏è Compiled Proxies ‚Äã

Velm generates real PHP model classes at compile time.

These proxies:

  • are namespaced
  • are autoloaded at runtime
  • contain zero reflection or runtime dispatch
  • work seamlessly with Eloquent

What you run is what you wrote.

üöÄ Runtime-Safe, Production-Ready ‚Äã

Velm:

  • compiles lazily in development
  • precompiles in production
  • never writes to vendor/
  • works with OPcache and Octane

No performance surprises.

A Better Mental Model ‚Äã

Models don‚Äôt inherit behavior.
They participate in it.

Velm gives each module a clear, predictable place in the model lifecycle ‚Äî without leaking concerns across boundaries.

Designed for Real Applications ‚Äã

Velm was built for:

  • modular systems
  • domain-driven design
  • large Laravel codebases
  • long-lived applications

It does not try to be clever ‚Äî
it tries to be correct.

Philosophy ‚Äã

Velm is opinionated by design.

It values:

  • clarity over convenience
  • explicitness over magic
  • composition over inheritance

If you‚Äôve ever asked:

‚ÄúWhere should this logic really live?‚Äù

Velm is for you.

Velm is open-source and actively evolving.
Built with care for teams who care about architecture.
